name: Primary Healthcare
description: BAART Community HealthCare provides primary care, preventive health services, and focused case management. Walk-ins, as well as appointments, are accepted during our hours of operation.
fullDescription: BAART Community HealthCare provides primary care, preventive health services, and focused case management. Walk-ins, as well as appointments, are accepted during our hours of operation.
whatTheyOffer: BAART Community HealthCare provides primary care, preventive health services, and focused case management. Walk-ins, as well as appointments, are accepted during our hours of operation.
howToGetIt: Contact Us at the following numbers in the Bay Area: San Francisco / Market St. - 415.862.2810 San Francisco / Turk St. - 415.573.3632 Richmond - 510.660.6202 Antioch - 925.281.3500
cost: Medi-Cal / Medicare Low Cost Sliding Fee Scale Free Services Where Available Health Plans Including: La Care, SFHP, CCHP, Anthem Blue Cross, Alta Med, Care 1st, Molina Health Net
agency: BAART - Bay Area Addiction Research & Treatment Inc.  (Main Office)
